trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: Renamed from docker.compare_container to docker.compare_containers (old function name remains as an alias)
trans-unit.target: 在版本2018.3.0中进行了更改：从 docker.compare_container 重命名为 docker.compare_containers （旧函数名称保留为别名）

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: Support added for network configuration options other than driver and driver_opts, as well as IPAM configuration.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版中进行了更改：添加了对除 driver 和 driver_opts 之外的网络配置选项以及IPAM配置的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: Support for all of docker-py's logs() function's arguments, with the exception of stream.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版中更改：支持docker-py的所有logs（）函数参数，但 stream 除外。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: Support for all of docker-py's logs() function's arguments, with the exception of stream.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2018.3.0中进行了更改：除了 stream 之外，支持所有docker-py的logs（）函数的参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: The Containers key for each network is no longer always empty.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2018.3.0中进行了更改：每个网络的 Containers 密钥不再总是为空。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: The tag argument has been added. It is now required unless pulling from a registry.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版中进行了更改：添加了 tag 参数。现在是必需的，除非从注册表中提取。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: The tag must be manually specified using the tag argument.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版本变更：该 tag 必须使用手动指定的 tag 参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: The repository and tag must now be passed separately using the repository and tag arguments, rather than together in the (now deprecated) image argument.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版中进行了更改：现在必须使用 repository 和 tag 参数分别传递存储库和标记，而不是（现在不建议使用） image 参数一起传递。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: The return for a given git_pillar remote will now be None when no changes were fetched. False now is reserved only for instances in which there were errors.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2018.3.0中进行了更改：当未获取任何更改时，给定git_pillar远程的返回现在将为 None 。 False 现在仅保留存在错误的实例。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: The service name can now be a glob (e.g. salt*)
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版本中更改：服务名称现在可以是全局名称（例如 salt* ）

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: The wake_on_lan capability, and actions destroy, reboot, and query functions were added.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版本中进行了修改。增加了wake_on_lan功能,以及动作destroy、reboot和查询功能。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: switched to localtime from gmtime so times now take into account timezones.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版本中更改:从gmtime切换到localtime,所以时间现在考虑到了时区。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.0: version can now contain comparison operators (e.g. >1.2.3, <=2.0, etc.)
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.0版中进行了更改：版本现在可以包含比较运算符（例如 >1.2.3 ， <=2.0 等）

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.1.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.1版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.1: Added `parsable` parameter that defaults to True
trans-unit.target: 在版本2018.3.1中进行了更改：添加了默认为True的 `parsable` parsable` 参数

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.1: Big refactor to remove duplicate code, better type converions and improved consistancy in output.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.1版本中进行了修改。大幅重构,删除了重复的代码,改善了类型转换,提高了输出的一致性。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.1: If lsattr is not installed on the system, None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2018.3.1中进行了更改：如果系统上未安装 lsattr ，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.4.
trans-unit.target: 在2018.3.4版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2018.3.4: If on AIX, None is returned even if in filesystem as lsattr on AIX is not the same thing as the linux version.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2018.3.4中进行了更改：如果在 AIX 上，即使在文件系统中（如 AIX 上的lsattr）与linux版本不同，也不返回 None 内容。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0.
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中有所改变。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: docker.update_mine now defaults to False
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中进行了更改： docker.update_mine 现在默认为 False

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: action key added to beacon event, and ut_type config parameter added.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中进行了更改：向信标事件添加了 action 键，并添加了 ut_type 配置参数。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: tagmatch can now be either a glob or regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中进行了更改： tagmatch 现在可以是glob或正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: Added obsoletes and minimal arguments
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中进行了更改：添加了 obsoletes 和 minimal 参数

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: Added seed argument. Will return the same result when run with the same seed.
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中有所改变。增加了种子参数。当使用相同的种子运行时,将返回相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: Added support for docker image uuids, added auto_lx_vars configuration, documented some missing configuration options.
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中进行了修改。增加了对docker镜像uuids的支持,增加了auto_lx_vars配置,记录了一些缺失的配置选项。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: Default for SunOS changed to 1 kilobyte blocks
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中有所改变。SunOS的默认值改为1千字节区块

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: Docker images are now also listed
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中有所改变。Docker镜像现在也被列出

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: If the networks option is used, any networks (including the default bridge network) which are not specified will be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中进行了更改：如果使用 networks 选项，则未指定的任何网络（包括默认的 bridge 网络）都将断开连接。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: Support for multiple package names added.
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中进行了修改。增加了对多个包名的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: The 'show_ipv4' argument has been renamed to 'show_ip' as it now includes IPv6 addresses for IPv6-connected minions.
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中进行了更改。"show_ipv4 "参数已更名为 "show_ip",因为它现在包括IPv6连接的小伙伴的IPv6地址。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: The hash and dry_run_first options are now ignored, as the logic which determines whether or not the patch has already been applied no longer requires them. Additionally, this state now supports patch files that modify more than one file. To use these sort of patches, specify a directory (and, if necessary, the strip option) instead of a file.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中进行了更改： hash 和 dry_run_first 选项现在被忽略，因为确定是否已应用补丁的逻辑不再需要它们。此外，此状态现在支持修改多个文件的补丁文件。要使用这些修补程序，请指定目录（如果需要，还可以指定 strip 选项）而不是文件。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: The default value of this argument will change to None to match the behavior of the file.blockreplace state
trans-unit.target: 改变在2019.2.0版本：此参数的默认值将变为 None 以匹配的行为 file.blockreplace state

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: The source can now be from any file source supported by Salt (salt://, http://, https://, ftp://, etc.). Templating is also now supported.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中进行了更改：源现在可以来自Salt支持的任何文件源（ salt:// ， http:// ， https:// ， ftp:// 等）。现在也支持模板。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: This argument can now support a list of templates to be rendered. The resulting configuration text is loaded at once, as a single configuration chunk.
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中有所改变。该参数现在可以支持要渲染的模板列表。由此产生的配置文本将作为单个配置块一次性加载。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: This option can now be set to remote-changes, which will instruct Salt not to discard local changes if the repo is up-to-date with the remote repository.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中更改：现在可以将此选项设置为 remote-changes ，如果回购是远程存储库的最新版本，它将指示Salt不放弃本地更改。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: This option now supports tags as well as branches, on Git 1.8.0 and newer.
trans-unit.target: 在2019.2.0版本中进行了修改。这个选项现在支持标签以及分支,在Git 1.8.0及更新版本上。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version 2019.2.0: This value can now be a pattern expression (using the pattern-matching characters defined in fnmatch). If a pattern expression is used, this function will return a dictionary mapping container names which match the pattern to the mappings for those containers. When no pattern expression is used, a dictionary of the mappings for the specified container name will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 在版本2019.2.0中更改：此值现在可以是模式表达式（使用fnmatch中定义的模式匹配字符）。如果使用模式表达式，此函数将返回一个字典映射容器名称，该名称将模式与这些容器的映射相匹配。当不使用任何模式表达式时，将返回指定容器名称的映射字典。

trans-unit.source: Changed in version develop: Runner uses the pillar_enc variable that allows renderers to render the pillar. This is usable when supplying the contents of a file as pillar, and the file contains gpg-encrypted entries.
trans-unit.target: 在版本开发中进行了修改。Runner 使用 pillar_enc 变量,允许渲染器渲染柱子。当提供一个文件的内容作为pillar,并且该文件包含pgp加密的条目时,这是可以使用的。

trans-unit.source: Checks to make sure the given row exists. If row exists and update is True then row will be updated with data. Otherwise it will leave existing row unmodified and check it against data. If the existing data doesn't match data_check the state will fail. If the row doesn't exist then it will insert data into the table. If more than one row matches, then the state will fail.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定的行是否存在,如果行存在并且update为True,那么行将被更新为数据。如果行存在并且update为True,那么行将被更新为数据。否则将不修改现有的行,并根据数据进行检查。如果现有的数据与data_check不匹配,那么状态将失败。如果该行不存在,那么它将把数据插入到表中。如果有多条记录匹配,那么状态就会失败。

trans-unit.source: Compare a complete loaded configuration against the candidate configuration. For each hierarchy level or configuration object that is different in the two configurations, the version in the loaded configuration replaces the version in the candidate configuration. When the configuration is later committed, only system processes that are affected by the changed configuration elements parse the new configuration. This action is supported from PyEZ 2.1 (default = False)
trans-unit.target: 将一个完整的已加载配置与候选配置进行比较。对于两个配置中不同的每个层次结构级别或配置对象,加载配置中的版本将取代候选配置中的版本。当后来提交配置时,只有受更改的配置元素影响的系统进程才会解析新配置。从PyEZ 2.1开始支持这个操作(默认=False)。

trans-unit.target: 将一个完整的已加载配置与候选配置进行比较。对于两个配置中不同的每个层次结构级别或配置对象,加载配置中的版本将取代候选配置中的版本。当后来提交配置时,只有受更改的配置元素影响的系统进程才会解析新配置。从PyEZ 2.1开始支持这个操作。

trans-unit.source: Compares the given timezone name with the system timezone name. Checks the hash sum between the given timezone, and the one set in /etc/localtime. Returns True if names and hash sums match, and False if not. Mostly useful for running state checks.

trans-unit.target: 比较虚拟机当前配置和新配置,当前配置是现在部署的配置,新配置是目标配置。返回字典中对象之间的差异,键是配置参数键,值是差异对象:列表或递归差异。

trans-unit.source: Create a special file similar to the 'nix mknod command. The supported device types are p (fifo pipe), c (character device), and b (block device). Provide the major and minor numbers when specifying a character device or block device. A fifo pipe does not require this information. The command will create the necessary dirs if needed. If a file of the same name not of the same type/major/minor exists, it will not be overwritten or unlinked (deleted). This is logically in place as a safety measure because you can really shoot yourself in the foot here and it is the behavior of 'nix mknod. It is also important to note that not just anyone can create special devices. Usually this is only done as root. If the state is executed as none other than root on a minion, you may receive a permission error.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个类似于'nix mknod命令的特殊文件。支持的设备类型为 p （fifo管道）， c （字符设备）和 b （块设备）。指定字符设备或块设备时，请提供主要和次要数字。 Fifo管道不需要此信息。如果需要，该命令将创建必要的目录。如果存在一个名称不相同/类型相同的文件，则不会被覆盖或取消链接（删除）。从逻辑上讲，这是安全措施，因为您可以在这里用脚射击自己，这是'nix mknod 的行为。同样重要的是要注意，不仅任何人都可以创建特殊设备。通常，这仅以root用户身份进行。如果该状态以无权执行，则可能会收到权限错误。
